initcondition.formula: "Total" >= "Workflow:Approval Threshold:Company Auto Approval Limit" AND "User" NOT IN ("Workflow:COO:Primary Approver") AND "User" NOT IN ("Workflow:CFO:Primary Approver") AND "User" NOT IN ("Workflow:CEO:Primary Approver")
"User" IN ("Workflow:COO:Primary Approver") AND "Total" >= "Workflow:Approval Threshold:Company Auto Approval Limit"
"User" IN ("Workflow:CFO:Primary Approver") AND "Total" >= "Workflow:Approval Threshold:COO Approval Limit"
"User" IN ("Workflow:CEO:Primary Approver") AND "Total" >= "Workflow:Approval Threshold:CFO Approval Limit"
"User" NOT IN ("Workflow:COO:Primary Approver") OR "User" IN ("Assigned Delegate Approver")
